high_descs: turn around to reach the desk
take the soap bar from the desk
now take soap bar near floor lamp
switch on the floor lamp using soap bar
anns.task_desc: switch on the floor lamp using soap bar

high_descs: Stand up turn around walk towards the desk.
Pick up the soap bar from the desk.
Turn around move towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the soap bar from the desk and turn on the desk lamp.

high_descs:
Turn right go straight turn left go to the desk  
Take the soap bar from the table  
Turn left go straight then turn right walk to go 
Turn on the desk   lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a soap bar by the light of a desk lamp.
